act.title: Dialog Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.pinyin: Nǐ hǎo, nǐ yào mǎi diǎn shénme?

item.hanzi: 葡萄卖完了，这些橙子是今天才来的，非常新鲜。
item.pinyin: Pútao mài wán le, zhèxiē chéngzi shì jīntiān cái lái de, fēicháng xīnxiān.

item.hanzi: 橙子三块五一斤，你要几斤?
item.pinyin: Chéngzi sān kuài wǔ yī jīn, nǐ yào jǐ jīn?

item.hanzi: 来三斤吧，嗯，这些香蕉怎么卖呢？
item.pinyin: Lái sān jīn ba, ēn, zhèxiē xiāngjiāo zěnme mài ne?

item.hanzi: 香蕉四块钱一斤，这些香蕉可好吃了。
item.pinyin: Xiāngjiāng sì kuài qián yī jīn, zhèxiē xiāngjiāo kě hǎochī le.
Nà yě gěi wǒ lái yī chuàn ba.
